name: sonobarr
description: Sonobarr is a self-hosted status and health dashboard for Sonarr/Radarr setups. It aggregates information, errors, and stats into a quick-glance bar-style UI.
features: Status dashboard: Displays health status of Sonarr and Radarr instances.
Error monitoring: Shows recent errors and warnings from arr services.
Queue overview: Displays download queue status and progress.
Disk space: Monitors available storage across media libraries.
Calendar view: Shows upcoming releases and downloads.
Service stats: Displays library counts and recent activity.
Multi-instance: Monitors multiple Sonarr and Radarr servers.
Compact display: Presents information in space-efficient bar layout.
Auto-refresh: Updates status automatically at configurable intervals.
Alert indicators: Highlights issues requiring attention.
Mobile responsive: Views status from smartphones and tablets.
API integration: Connects to arr services via their REST APIs.
